parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The explosion of the battery can cause a fire, which can lead to serious injury or death, and damage to the vehicle.
The faulty wiring can cause the trailer brakes to overheat, leading to loss of control of the trailer, which can result in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: inability to connect a brake controller.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine timing chain can cause the engine to stall, leading to a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: the vehicle is unable to maintain speed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive oil consumption can lead to premature engine wear, engine damage, and potentially cause the engine to seize, resulting in a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle consumes excessive amounts of oil
the vehicle uses a quart of oil for every 1000 miles.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Stalling Due to Unknown Causes
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine stalling can cause a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: the vehicle is unable to maintain speed.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Power Steering Fluid Hose Clamp Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering fluid hose clamp can cause power steering failure, leading to loss of vehicle control and increased risk of accidents.
The failure of the front crankshaft pulley can cause loss of power steering, leading to loss of vehicle control and increased risk of accidents.
The failure of the power window cluster can cause inoperative power windows, which can be a safety concern in emergency situations.
symptoms: all four window clusters need to be replaced to fix one window.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Power steering fluid leaks can cause power steering failure, leading to loss of vehicle control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: leaks appear more frequently during winter season
metal expands due to cold weather.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission failure can cause sudden loss of control, violent halting, and uncontrolled movements, which can lead to accidents and fatalities.
symptoms: Transmission disengages and downshifts while driving
vehicle comes to a violent halt
and then lurches back and forth uncontrollably without operator input

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake system failure can cause loss of control, accidents, and fatalities, especially when the anti-lock brake system (ABS) malfunctions.
symptoms: Brake pedal is stiff when trying to stop
ABS system kicks in and throws the vehicle to the side of the road
vehicle is unable to stop or slow down properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission oil leaks can cause damage to the transmission and surrounding components, leading to premature failure and potential safety hazards.
symptoms: gas pedal is stiff and hard to press.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical system malfunctions can cause inconvenience, safety risks, and damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: Door locks keep going up and down when using the remote control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Rear washer hose failure can cause inconvenience and reduce visibility while driving.
symptoms: Rear washer hose needs to be replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Wheel and brake component failure can cause loss of control, accidents, and fatalities.
symptoms: Noise in the left front wheel
